org.apache.oodt.cas.resource.jobqueue

Interface MappedJobQueue

  • All Superinterfaces:
    JobQueue
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FifoMappedJobQueue

    public interface MappedJobQueue
extends JobQueue
    The interface for a JobQueue that is aware of the different queues in the ResourceManager and allows for the manipulation of jobs on a queue-by-queue basis.
    Author:
    resneck

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • isEmpty

        boolean isEmpty(String queueName)
         throws JobQueueException
        Returns a boolean value representing whether or not the job queue contains jobs in the given queue.
        Parameters:
        queueName - The name of the queue which you are checking.
        Returns:
        true, if the queue is empty, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        JobQueueException - If the given queue name is null or if no queue with that name exists.

      • getNextJob

        JobSpec getNextJob(String queueName)
            throws JobQueueException,
                   JobRepositoryException
        Gets the next JobSpec in the queue with the given name.
        Parameters:
        queueName - The name of the queue from which the next JobSpec will be returned.
        Returns:
        The next JobSpec from the jobqueue belonging to the queue with the given name.
        Throws:
        JobQueueException - If the given queue name is null or if no queue with that name exists.
        JobRepositoryException

      • getSize

        int getSize(String queueName)
     throws JobQueueException
        Gets the number of jobs in the queue with the given name.
        Parameters:
        queueName - The name of the queue whos size will be given.
        Returns:
        The number of JobSpecs in the queue with the given name.
        Throws:
        JobQueueException - If the given queue name is null or if no queue with that name exists.

        Returns:

        Throws:
